original_title: ComBank celebrates Poson with ‘Pahan Gee’ recital by Bank staff
original_body_lines: The Commercial Bank of Ceylon recently celebrated Poson with a traditional ‘Pahan Gee’ recital performed by a 30-member choir comprising of staff of the Bank. The event held at the Navarangahala, was attended by many present and past staff members and their families. Representatives of the Bank’s corporate and senior management, including Chairman Prof. Ananda Jayawardane, Managing Director/ CEO Sanath Manatunge and several directors graced the occasion.

Popular Sri Lankan musician Mr Jagath Wickramasinghe graced the event as the guest artist and performed a few songs with the Bank’s staff. A special feature of this year’s recital was that many of the devotional songs performed by the choir were produced for the Bank.
